title: Nationals, NBA problem, Warriors, & Baker Mayfield
itunes:title: Nationals, NBA problem, Warriors, & Baker Mayfield
description:
Colin explains why the Nationals winning the World Series had nothing to do with A. J. Hinch pulling Zack Greinke, the newest problem facing the NBA, why the Warriors struggles aren't all bad, and why Browns fans might have something to look forward to. Guests include Mark Schlereth, Greg Cosell, Mark Medina, and Peter King.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
